name: Car Wash Learning Unlocked
description:
Thousands of kids love our Car Wash Learning Game. We've listened. Car Wash Learning Unlocked offers you the best of the game, plus:
- No ads!
- All Basic Vehicles Unlocked
- Special Series of Race cars (Unlocked)
- Sports Car Series (All Unlocked)

Everyone loves cars! In this app, enjoy the sweet satisfaction that comes when you clean a car and drive it right after it's been cleaned. This game is not only for kids and toddlers but for the whole family to enjoy.

This app features a variety of cars, car wash equipment, and washing stations with which you can tidy up the car, apply soap, wash, shine, wax, and polish.

The game has many different models of cars, so that everyone can choose a car that they likes. Each car needs to be washed using soap, water, a towel, and then the car can be polished.

The app develops children's memories, attention to detail, and fine motor skills as they identify various categories of cars and colors and pick one for the car wash. Car Wash is a fascinating and bright game that helps everyone gain skills and confidence.

The whole family can enjoy this fabulous animated car wash experience!
